reviewText: Brilliant performance by Mickey Rourke!  He really should have won the Academy Award for this!  Marisa Tomei is perfect as always, and a fine performance by Evan Rachel Wood.

This made me so emotional, what a ride! If you need a damn good drama to take you on an emotional rollercoaster, this is for you.

I won't spoil anything, read the discription for the plot, trust me it's wonderful
Item arrived in a timely manner, and as described. Film features a powerhouse performance by Mickey Rourke.
This is a very good movie about a broken man.
